synopsis.text: Animation crafted by a first-year student of Tokyo University of the Arts in 2017, this heartwarming tale follows a nostalgic motorbike yearning for the glory days of its past. With courage as its fuel, the motorbike embarks on a daring journey towards a future filled with new possibilities. Prepare to be captivated by this unique story that breathes life into an inanimate object, giving it dreams and aspirations that resonate with us all.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
